title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Sustained Science Learning Competency Through Mobile Learning Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles and fundamental smart device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can practice self-directed science learning at least three times weekly using mobile learning tools
Learners can achieve at least 80% understanding of basic science concepts through mobile quiz applications
Learners can create personalized learning plans based on learning habit survey results
Learners can interact with peers on science-related topics at least twice weekly on mobile discussion platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
